stratagems.name: Squires' Duty
stratagems.timing: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase
stratagems.target: Two or more ARMIGER models from your army and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those ARMIGER models
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, when resolving attacks that target that enemy unit, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of weapons equipped by those ARMIGER models by 1. If your army is Honoured, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons as well
stratagems.flavorText: Under the scrutiny and judgement of their Noble betters, Armiger pilots will redouble their efforts, attacking as one to smash aside their foes

stratagems.name: Rotate Ion Shields
stratagems.timing: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets
stratagems.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, that IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model has a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks
stratagems.flavorText: Veteran Knight pilots can swiftly angle their ion shields to better deflect incoming fire

stratagems.name: Thunderstomp
stratagems.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model cannot target MONSTER or VEHICLE units, but all melee weapons equipped by your model have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability
stratagems.flavorText: The Noble brings their Knight suit's full weight crashing down with the force of an industrial piledriver. Few can survive such a blow

stratagems.name: Valiant Last Stand
stratagems.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that was just destroyed and that is eligible to fight but has not been selected to fight this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed
stratagems.effect: Before rolling to see if this model deals any mortal wounds as a result of its Deadly Demise ability, it can fight; when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining, or all its wounds remaining if your army is Honoured. After it has finished resolving its attacks, resolve its Deadly Demise ability as normal
stratagems.flavorText: Badly wounded, their Knight's generator on the verge of overload, still the Noble fights on, drawing upon their reserves of chivalric heroism to sell their life as dearly as they can
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target SIR HEKHTUR with this Stratagem

stratagems.name: Trophy Claim
stratagems.timing: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase
stratagems.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll. If your model destroys that enemy unit this phase, you gain 1CP, but if your model does not destroy that enemy unit this phase, you cannot use this Stratagem again for the rest of the battle
stratagems.flavorText: Once a mighty foe is laid low, the victorious Knight's emitters blare its triumph, announcing the glory brought to the Imperium, but shame awaits those who fail in such confrontations

stratagems.name: Shoulder the Burden
stratagems.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has lost one or more wounds
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Save, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll
stratagems.flavorText: When faced with their darkest hour, knightly Nobles rise to the challenge, for nothing shall deter them from fulfilling their duty
stratagems.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle. If your army is Honoured, you can use this Stratagem one additional time

source: Wahapedia - Imperial Knights Index - Noble Lance Stratagems
note: Définitions officielles des stratagèmes Noble Lance Imperial Knights
